Text:
Just crack it - and ignore the missing cd error. If the game has rainbow graphics open up the control panel menu where you change your resolution settings and KEEP IT OPEN. Alt tab in out of the game until it works.

Tested and works just fine on Windows 7 64Bit (Though not this particular torrent)
I can't seem to install this.  Setup.exe runs, but then does absolutely nothing except sit in the processes of my task manager.  Can anyone help?  I really want to play this game again.
Excellent torrent, just follow the installation readme and everything should work fine, even on Win 7.
The file SMACX.mds did not mount for me, it says invalid image file.  I overcome this -- delete file SMACX.mds and mount SMACX.mdf.

The .mds file is not meant to be mounted. This is the Media Descriptor file created by Alcohol 120 when the disk was ripped.

Its probably there for a reason..

Mount .mdf files in whatever virtual drive program you use and leave the .mds files alone.
